title: It Started with Brian
description: Sam searches for love and acceptance as he deals with the pressures of student life, a troubled family and his emerging confusion over his sexuality as he finds himself falling in love with his best friend.'It Started with Brian' is Dan Kincaid's auto-biography (Sam in the story). He passed before he was able to able to finish it and a friend (Adam Phillips) continued it in his honor.Words 183,078
author: Dan Kincaid
